T16D4385:316a-1: bo dhi a'a ka ra pra ni dh'a na /
T16D4385:316a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4385:316a-5: log rtog mun bsal mkhyen rab 'dab rgyas shing //
T16D4385:316a-6: bdud bzhi'i dgra bcom yang dag ji bzhin gshegs //
T16D4385:316a-7: thugs rje'i mtsho bskyil don mchog 'byor ba'i gter //
T16D4385:316a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4385:316a-9: mkha' ltar mtshan med rab zhi rtog las 'das //
T16D4385:316a-10: sgrib pa'i skyon bral legs tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas //
T16D4385:316a-11: skye bo 'gro mang byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas //
T16D4385:316a-12: yang dag dam chos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4385:316a-13: nyon mongs dgra rgyal srid mtsho las rgal cing //
T16D4385:316a-14: sdug bsngal mtshon spangs yang dag thar lam mkhyen //
T16D4385:316a-15: 'gro la phan mdzad yon tan mang po'i phul //
T16D4385:316a-16: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4385:316a-17: chos dbyings mkha' dkyil mkhyen rab nyi shar nas //
T16D4385:316a-18: rmongs pa'i mun bsal yang dag chos nyid rtogs //
T16D4385:316a-19: thabs ldan thugs rjes 'gro la phan brtson pa //
T16D4385:316a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4385:316a-21: rin chen sa gzhi dpag bsam nags tshal bcas //
T16D4385:316a-22: yid bzhin gzhal yas gdan khri rgyan mchog ldan //
T16D4385:316b-0: lha mi'i mchod sprin mang po gtibs @316b pa rnams //
T16D4385:316b-1: yon tan gter mnga' sras bcas rgyal la 'bul //
T16D4385:316b-2: dus kun bdag gis dkon mchog gsum spangs shing //
T16D4385:316b-3: de yi bskor phyogs byang chub sems btang dang //
T16D4385:316b-4: mtshams med la sogs smad pa'i las byas rnams //
T16D4385:316b-5: bla ma'i spyan sngar de bshags slan chad bsdams //
T16D4385:316b-6: sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos dang //
T16D4385:316b-7: byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo yi //
T16D4385:316b-8: bsod nams rgyu dang 'bras bcas ci mchis pa //
T16D4385:316b-9: de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T16D4385:316b-10: phyogs gang 'gro la sman slad bde gshegs rnams //
T16D4385:316b-11: mya ngan 'dar bzhed chos bshad bskul gzhes la //
T16D4385:316b-12: 'gro ba'i don slad mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T16D4385:316b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskul //
T16D4385:316b-14: skyon kun byang zhing yon tan kun rdzogs pa //
T16D4385:316b-15: sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dkon mchog la //
T16D4385:316b-16: bdag ni dus kun lus 'bul skyabs gsol gyis //
T16D4385:316b-17: yongs bzhes log lta'i lam las bskyab tu gsol //
T16D4385:316b-18: bdag gis 'gro ba'i nyon mongs bsal slad dang //
T16D4385:316b-19: byang chub spyad pa'i bcom ldan gdung bsab phyir //
T16D4385:316b-20: bdag med rtog bral mi gnas rtag pa yi //
T16D4385:316b-21: bla med byang chub mchog tu dus kun bskyed //
T16D4385:316b-22: phyogs dus bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs //
T16D4385:316b-23: khyod la bdag gi sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang //
T16D4385:316b-24: dge ba chos sdud sems can don byed pa'i //
T16D4385:316b-25: bslab gsum deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T16D4385:316b-26: bsod nams stobs 'dis chos gnas thams cad la //
T16D4385:316b-27: bla med mchod sprin 'byung zhing bgyi bgyis shog / sems can rnams kyang sgrib tshogs kun byang nas //
T16D4385:316b-28: yon tan tshogs rdzogs kun mkhyen mchog gyur cig / bdag kyang dus kun blo rnams snying rje ldan //
T16D4385:316b-29: ting 'dzin shes rab gzungs sgo mchog thob nas //
T16D4385:316b-30: 'gro kun bder 'gyur spyod mchog rnams byed cing //
T16D4385:316b-31: chos rnams mtshan nyid ji bzhin rtogs gyur cig / bsdu ba bzhis bsdus pha rol phyin rdzogs shing //
T16D4385:316b-32: mos spyod la sogs sa rnams kun sbyangs nas //
T16D4385:317a-0: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib tshogs @317a * //
T16D4385:317a-2: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur //
T16D4385:317a-3: bdag ni mthong thos reg pa'am dran tsam gyis //
T16D4385:317a-4: 'gro kun nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi byed shog / lus sems ngag rnams spyod yul cir 'jug pa //
T16D4385:317a-5: srog chags rnams la bde ba'i rgyur gyur cig / dus kun bdag gis lus ngag yid kun nas //
T16D4385:317a-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad ci bsags pa //
T16D4385:317a-7: dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar bsngos pa bzhin //
T16D4385:317a-8: thams cad bla med byang chub myur 'grub bsngo //
